item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Ehsanul Hoque (Rishad)! I’m a Software Engineer and technology enthusiast living and working in Dhaka, Bangladesh. I work mostly in TensorFlow, Python, C/C++, and Java. My main interest is in server-side technology and massive scalability, but I’ve also worked in a mobile platform (Android) Check out my GitHub page to see what I’ve been up to recently! Contact If you’d like to get in touch, you can find me on LinkedIn or reach me at contact@gamerrishad.
